Description:
Detects a Get-Process command on lsass process, which is in almost all cases a sign of malicious activity

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: PowerShell Get-Process LSASS in ScriptBlock
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where scriptblocktext like '%get-process lsass%'
